sentences.sentence: Three Dimensional Spectroscopy has been one of the most important methods for spectroscopes.
sentences.translation: 介绍了二维红外光谱方法在光谱学分析中的一些应用领域。

sentences.sentence: In this paper, two different interference systems for making plane holographic gratings are presented. The gratings obtained can be used in various types of spectroscopes.
sentences.translation: 本文介绍了制作全息平面光栅的两种干涉仪系统。所得到的光栅分别用于不同的分光仪器中。
